    Thread-1-2025-05-17

    • Saturday, May 17, 2025
    • #threads

    Debbie Harry and Kurt Russell

    View on Threads

    Tigers TV doing a whole inning of game 7 talk.

    Jays announcers wearing Leafs jerseys.

    Ernie Clement taking ground balls in a Leafs jersey (noticed he was wearing a John Tavares C jersey who’s no longer the captain)

    Fans in Leafs gear and tailgating.

    Please Florida.

    End this!

    — Jeff Riger (@riger1984) May 18, 2025
